items.sentence: I want to be able to play the saxophone as well as Tom.
It's a good habit to look up new words in a dictionary.
Tom is shorter and weighs significantly less than Mary.
I'm listening to a recording of your concert right now.
Tom couldn't help but tease Mary a little bit about it.
Tom spends at least three hours a day riding his horse.
I should've guessed that you were the one who did this.
Tom only does something if he feels confident about it.
Tom and Mary play tennis together several times a week.
Tom and I agreed that we'd never talk about that again.
